title: My Little Pony Novel
description:
14 My Little Pony novels ready for Kindle reading in MOBI format.  Files are named by series order, but display in Kindle by book title.

My daughter says the stories seem to be self-contained and do not build on one another.

Ages 8 - 12, Grades 3 - 7; novel length between 150 and 250 pgs.

Equestria Girls
MLP Equestria Girls 001 Through the
MLP Equestria Girls 002 Rainbow
MLP Equestria Girls 003 The Mane
MLP Equestria Girls 004 Sunset Shimmers Time to Shine.mobi

My Little Pony
MLP 001 Twilight Sparkle and the Crystal
MLP 002 Pinkie Pie and the Rockin' Ponypalooza Party.mobi
MLP 003 Rainbow Dash and the Daring Do Double Dare.mobi
MLP 004 Rarity and the Curious Case of Charity.mobi
MLP 005 Applejack and the Honest-to-Goodness
MLP 006 Fluttershy and the Fine Furry Friends
MLP 007 Discord and the Ponyville Players
MLP 008 Lyra and Bon Bon and the Mares from S.M.I.L.E.mobi

Princess Collection
MLP Princess Collect 001 Princess Celestia and the Summer of Royal
MLP Princess Collect 002 Princess Luna and the Festival of the Winter
